<template>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'App',
  created() {
    this.$on('login', (socket) => {
      this.socket = socket  // 保存连接
    })
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
